title: Maria's Halloween
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 77 words, Level D (Grade 1), Lexile 170L, Fiction Series
description: Maria's Halloween tells about a family's night of trick-or-treating. The story uses familiar vocabulary, high-frequency words, and repetitive text to support beginning readers. Students will enjoy the surprise at the end of the story.
highFrequencyWords: for, go, look, or, the, you
reviewWords: ghost, Halloween, pumpkin, spider, treat, trick
comprehension: Story Elements                : Identify characters and setting
awareness: Final Consonants                : Discriminate final consonant /k/ sound
grammar: Proper Nouns                : Recognize and understand names as proper nouns
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
